mapper.select: /* rentEvents - 대여 일정 불러오기 */ SELECT (SELECT l.library_title FROM library l WHERE l.library_idx = r.library_idx) AS bookTitle ,rent_startdate AS start ,DATE_ADD(rent_enddate, INTERVAL 1 DAY) AS end FROM rent r WHERE member_idx = #{param} AND rent_state IN (2,3,4)

/* borrowEvents - 대출 일정 불러오기 */ SELECT (SELECT l.library_title FROM library l WHERE l.library_idx = r.library_idx) AS bookTitle ,rent_startdate AS start ,DATE_ADD(rent_enddate, INTERVAL 1 DAY) AS end FROM rent r INNER JOIN library l ON r.library_idx IN (SELECT l.library_idx FROM library WHERE library_blind = 0 AND l.member_idx = #{param}) WHERE rent_state IN (2,3,4);

/* changeEvents - 교환 일정 불러오기 */ SELECT DISTINCT (c.change_date) AS start ,(SELECT l.library_title FROM library l WHERE l.library_idx = c.library_book2) AS bookTitle FROM `change` c INNER JOIN library l ON (c.member_idx = #{param} OR c.library_book IN (SELECT l.library_idx FROM library WHERE member_idx = #{param})) WHERE c.change_state IN (2,4)
/* clubEvents - 모임 일정 불러오기 */ SELECT club_name AS title, club_meetdate AS start FROM club c LEFT JOIN club_apply a ON c.club_idx = a.club_idx WHERE a.member_idx = #{param} AND a.club_appstate = '참여'
